name: Compression
short_description: Compress outgoing content using gzip, deflate or custom encoder and thus reduce the size of the response

documentation.description: The [Compression](https://ktor.io/docs/compression.html) plugin allows you to compress outgoing content. You can use different compression algorithms, including `gzip` and `deflate`, specify the required conditions for compressing data (such as a content type or response size), or even compress data based on specific request parameters.
